actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to declare that certain land of the United States be held by the United States in trust for the Nez Perce Indian Tribe of Idaho.

summary.text: States that specified lands in Idaho are to be held by the United States in trust for the Nez Perce Tribe of Idaho.

titles.title: A bill to declare that certain land of the United States be held by the United States in trust for the Nez Perce Indian Tribe of Idaho.
